title: Obama Needs To Pick Up Approval Rating, For Senate Democrats' Sake
teaser: Recent polls have President Obama's approval ratings hovering around 40 percent. That's a new career low. NPR's Arun Rath talks with correspondent Mara Liasson about what that means for Democrats in November's midterm elections.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
